name: react-graphql
description: - quick primer on what graphql is and why we might want to use it ## Scaffold backend with graphql-yoga - Setup simple schema - Book  - id  - title - start with one hardcoded Book  -write simple Query resolver   - get all books   - get book by id - manually run graphql query ## Scaffold front end with apollo-client - Use Query HOC to query for all books  - create link to view specific book - We are going to want to create new Books  - Create `createBook` Mutation   - schema   - resolver ## Other Topics - Caching  - manual cache manipulation
